title: saxydev
author: saxydev
content: I believe this is big news for NEAR protocol fans.I do not use Coinbase, but very happy to hear about this upgrade.What do you think about NEAR?

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: This is huge success for Near Protocol. I was so bullish on Ethereum when it was trading above 10$ . Near Rise to above 15$ but then bear market come and it goes down very low. With that News we have seen some pull back in price and hope it will again rise upto 10$. Fundamentally Near is very strong and we can say that it will be best then Solona in long term.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I don't use Coinbase and am not an investor of Near Protocol. But I'm seeing how they are working with this project.I used to look at the things they do and want to know more about them. Well, congratulations to them and to the believers of this project. This is the reason why it has got an increase recently on its price.

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Right now I am very sorry I have not done this topic self-moderated! My mistake on this

comments.author: YellowSwap
comments.body: It's funny how people gets excited about projects listing on coinbase, is rather see a token on kucoin or binance than coinbase, it's just the name that has no effect on the project, yea let near rise a bit and it will still go back to where it was before, the reality is bear market is alive right now.

comments.author: antsam
comments.body: Yes, this is great news and an important step forward for NEAR, with its entry on Coinbase providing a wider market for the Near platform which has been less progressive during its development.

comments.author: Uzairjutt275
comments.body: Wow that's a awesome news. Near protocol Is a huge success in cryptocurrency Market and good news for near protocol fans. Also Coinbase is very good platform. This is a very important step to promote the Near Token.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on August 31, 2022, 06:54:42 PMIt's funny how people gets excited about projects listing on coinbase, is rather see a token on kucoin or binance than coinbase, it's just the name that has no effect on the project, yea let near rise a bit and it will still go back to where it was before, the reality is bear market is alive right now.Why funny? Like when someone got listed on coinbase should expect a pump isnt it? People got excited for different reason like coinbase users now can use their account to purchase near which probably some are wishing aside from major exchanges. Its not just a listing, but an achievement for near protocol, so I dont think thats a funny statement.
